## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock for the next 5 days, accounting for potential demand fluctuations and lead time. This order size, in conjunction with current stock, exceeds the forecasted demand for the next 5 days by 2,571 units, providing a buffer. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommended order size is lower than the player's planned 60,000 units. This adjustment reduces the risk of overstocking and ensures efficient use of capital. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 1.3 days                                 |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.5 days                                 |
| Comments                          | This recommendation utilizes the available vendor order quantities to achieve the optimal balance between meeting demand and minimizing inventory holding costs. |
